title: Abrugodige Estate
text: Abrugodige Estate is a village in the southern state of <a href="Karnataka">Karnataka</a>, <a href="India">India</a>. It is located in the <a href="Mudigere">Mudigere</a> <a href="taluk">taluk</a> of <a href="Chikkamagaluru%20district">Chikkamagaluru district</a> in Karnataka.
